name: Margaritaville Resort Lake Tahoe
description: Margaritaville Resort Lake Tahoe brings island vibes to South Lake Tahoe. Indoor/outdoor pool, LandShark Bar & Grill, St. Somewhere Spa. Walking distance to Heavenly Village.
shortDescription: Island-inspired resort with LandShark Bar, spa, and walking distance to Heavenly Village.

roomTypes.name: Standard King Room
roomTypes.description: Island-inspired room with premium king bed, tropical-modern decor, flat-screen TV, Bluetooth speaker, mini-fridge, and Margaritaville-branded amenities.

roomTypes.name: Balcony Suite
roomTypes.description: Upgraded suite with private balcony, separate sitting area, enhanced amenities, and mountain or resort views.

faqs.question: What makes Margaritaville different from other Tahoe hotels?
faqs.answer: Margaritaville brings Jimmy Buffett's laid-back island lifestyle to the mountains — with tropical-inspired decor, a lively restaurant and bar scene, outdoor pool with cabanas, and a relaxed vacation atmosphere year-round.

faqs.question: What dining is available?
faqs.answer: The resort features the LandShark Bar & Grill for casual dining, the 5 o'Clock Somewhere Bar for cocktails, and a complimentary breakfast for guests.

faqs.question: How close is Margaritaville to the ski resorts?
faqs.answer: The Heavenly Gondola is a short drive or shuttle ride away. The hotel also offers easy access to South Lake Tahoe beaches and Stateline casinos.
